Our Philosophy & Mission
Our Philosophy: Minnesota Teen Challenge is founded on firm moral principles grounded in the Bible. Minnesota Teen Challenge believes and promotes these principles as put forth in the Scripture, as the basis and foundation for healing, restoration and life recovery.
Our Mission: To assist teens and adults in gaining freedom from chemical addiction by applying Biblical principles in establishing a chemical-free lifestyle, enhancing social skills, improving work habits, building supportive relationships, and growing in personal relationship with Jesus Christ.
